frontmatter.title: Sharding
frontmatter.description: Learn about sharding - breaking up and distributing the data load needed to give Ethereum more transaction capacity and make it easier to run.
frontmatter.summaryPoint1: Sharding is a multi-phase upgrade to improve Ethereum’s scalability and capacity.
frontmatter.summaryPoint2: Sharding provides secure distribution of data storage requirements, enabling rollups to be even cheaper, and making nodes easier to operate.
frontmatter.summaryPoint3: They enable layer 2 solutions to offer low transaction fees while leveraging the security of Ethereum.
frontmatter.summaryPoint4: This upgrade has become more of a focus since Ethereum moved to proof-of-stake.
